#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
      int number,m,k;
      while(1)
      {
                 int i=0,l=0,c=0,v=0,x=0;
                 cin>>number;
                 if(number==0)
                 break;
                 else
                 {
                 for(k=1;k<=number;k++)
                 {
                                  m=k%5;
								  if(m==4)
                                  i+=1;
                                  else
                                  i+=m;
                                  m=k%10;
                                  if(m>3&&m<9)
                                  v+=1;
                                  m=k%50;
                                  if(m<9){}
                                  else if(m<19)
                                  x+=1;
                                  else if(m<29)
                                  x+=2;
                                  else if(m<39)
                                  x+=3;
                                  else if(m==39)
                                  x+=4;
                                  else if(m<49)
                                  x+=1;
                                  else if(m==49)
                                  x+=2;
                                  if(k>39&&k<90)
                                  l+=1;
                                  if(k>=90)
                                  c+=1;
                 }
                 cout<<i<<" "<<v<<" "<<x<<" "<<l<<" "<<c<<endl;
                 }
      }
      return 0;
}
